title: C. J. Cherryh - Peacemaker
description:

But now safety is foremost: CajeiriÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s grandfather has been assassinated, hostile Assassins Guild invaded Great-uncleÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s house, and now Bren Cameron, paidhi-aiji, who was sent to keep the aijiÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s son safe, has more than the young guests on his mind. The aiji-dowager knows whoÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s to blame for the attacks, and theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re going after him.

The fact that the person responsible is in the heart of AssassinsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ Guild Headquarters, the most closely guarded fortress on the continent, is not going to stop her.

Bren Cameron has the pieces now, of a decades-old plot thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s been threaded through Guild actions going back before his arrival on the continent, and moreÃ¢â‚¬â€he knows the person responsible is going to find out he knows, and find out within hours.
